definition: to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Stromatolites were the first to exhale oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 叠层石是最先释放氧气的。

sentences.english: The oxygen exhaled by those stromatolites is what we all breathe today.
sentences.chinese: 叠层石所散发出的氧气正是我们今天所呼吸的。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the growing process of columnar stromatolites.
sentences.chinese: 本文就柱状叠层石的生长过程作一简要的分析。

sentences.english: As only one kind of fossil in Proterozoic, stromatolite is an important material in the paleogeography changing study.
sentences.chinese: 元古代叠层石是研究古地理变化的重要材料。

sentences.english: Stromatolites are the heroes in my story.
sentences.chinese: 叠层石是我故事里的英雄。

sentences.english: He also thought stromatolites were organic in origin.
sentences.chinese: 他还认为叠层石是有机体的来源。

definition: pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
Sinian (c. 800-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
